mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from member
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into member (id, username, `password`, sex, birth, phone, email, `header`, integral, member_type, `status`, create_time, last_update_time, is_disable) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{header,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDisable,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update member
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
username = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{record.sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
birth = #{record.birth,jdbcType=DATE},
phone = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`header` = #{record.header,jdbcType=BIGINT},

member_type = #{record.memberType,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`status` = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_time = #{record.lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_disable = #{record.isDisable,jdbcType=BIT},

update member set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `header` = #{header,jdbcType=BIGINT}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_type = #{memberType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_disable = #{isDisable,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: m.id, m.username, m.sex, m.birth, m.phone, m.email, m.`header`,image.url as 'header_url', m.integral, m.member_type, mt.name as 'member_type_name', m.`status`, m.create_time, m.last_update_time
member as m LEFT JOIN member_type as mt on mt.id = m.member_type LEFT JOIN image on image.id = m.header
